Control Name: INFORMATION SYSTEM COMPONENT INVENTORY | NO DUPLICATE ACCOUNTING OF COMPONENTS
Control Statement: The organization verifies that all components within the authorization boundary of the information system are not duplicated in other information system inventories.Supplemental Guidance:  This control enhancement addresses the potential problem of duplicate accounting of information system components in large or complex interconnected systems.
